channel.title: deployment on HAL Management Console
channel.description: Recent content in deployment on HAL Management Console

item.title: Inspect HTTP Sessions
item.description: The undertow subsystem in deployments has been enhanced and provides new operations to inspect HTTP sessions. Session Statistics To see session statistics please select a deployment under “Runtime / Server / Web / Deployment”. Besides the main attributes like deployment name and context path, the preview shows statistics for the number of active, expired and invalid sessions. Besides that you can see statistics about the session time. Session Attributes If you select a deployment and press “View”, you can see more details about the deployment.
